problem.p: Based on the diagram above, what does the character say if the choice is 1?:
Based on the diagram above, what does the character say if the choice is 2?:
Based on the diagram above, what does the character say if the choice is 3?:

div.p: The choices are decided by the random number generator.
the duck chose 1, and says rock
the cat chose 2, and says paper
so for the choice 3, the character must say scissors
